meanings.definition: Outdated or obsolete due to age
meanings.sent1: The superannuated computer struggled to run modern software.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed superannuated artifacts from ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The superannuated phone rang with a nostalgic tone.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion sense was as superannuated as a vinyl record player.
meanings.sent5: The superannuated car sputtered along the road, a relic of a bygone era.

meanings.sent1: The superannuated professor enjoyed his days of leisure.
meanings.sent2: The superannuated employee spent his time gardening and reading.
meanings.sent3: The superannuated dog happily napped in the sun all day.
meanings.sent4: She felt as superannuated as the old rocking chair in the corner.
meanings.sent5: The superannuated cat purred contentedly in its retirement years.

meanings.definition: Exceeding the normal age of retirement
meanings.sent1: The superannuated athlete amazed everyone with his agility on the field.
meanings.sent2: The superannuated couple traveled the world in their golden years.
meanings.sent3: The superannuated tree stood tall, a testament to its longevity.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was as sharp as ever, despite being superannuated in years.
meanings.sent5: The superannuated tortoise slowly but steadily won the race against younger competitors.
